title: Socially Shared Regulatory Scaffolding Strategies to Enhance Teamwork Skills in Online Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic project management and experience with collaboration tools
context.additional_context: Blended approach integrating online project-based learning simulations and offline workshops in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners design role allocation and decision-making processes within teams to establish 100% of project timelines within three weeks
Learners use peer evaluation tools during team activities to measure and provide feedback on member contributions at least once weekly
Learners apply conflict resolution strategies in online collaboration simulations during Week 8 to achieve over 90% team goal attainment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
